DOC.brief_summary: This post-marketing surveillance study is designed to collect and assess information on safety and effectiveness of lamotrigine tablets in patients with bipolar disorder in routine clinical practice. ("LAMICTAL" is a trademark of the GlaxoSmithKline group of companies.)
DOC.brief_title: Special Drug Use Investigation for LAMICTAL Bipolar
DOC.criteria: Patients with bipolar disorder Patients treated with lamotrigine tablets for the first time
